description: The fire involved the car's engine compartment. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car catches fire on East Coast Parkway on Wednesday
title_page: Car catches fire on East Coast Parkway on Wednesday | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - A car caught fire on the East Coast Parkway on Wednesday night, near the Pan-Island Expressway and Tampines Expressway exit.
Photos online showed a silver car spewing a large cloud of smoke.
The Singapore Civil Defence Force said on Thursday that it was alerted to the fire at about 11.50pm on Wednesday.
The fire, which involved the carâ€™s engine compartment, was extinguished by firefighters using two hose reels and a dry powder extinguisher.
No injuries were reported.
The cause of the fire is under investigation.
